law.catch_line: Fees For Issuing Documents, Certificates, Etc.; Disposition

text.section: For a certificate to the effect that all taxes due and payable under this chapter with respect to a particular parcel or parcels of real estate as a result of the death of a specified decedent have been paid or that no such tax is due and that said real estate is free of any lien chargeable under this chapter.
For a waiver to the effect that no tax is due under this chapter, as a result of the death of a specified decedent.
For a photostatic copy of the computation sheet showing the computation of the tax due under this chapter as a result of the death of a specified decedent.
For a certificate showing the amount of tax paid under this chapter.
For a duplicate copy of the commissioner’s “Determination of Value” issued pursuant to section twenty-five.
For a duplicate copy of a tax bill showing the amount of any tax assessed under this chapter.
For a duplicate copy of a receipt showing the amount of any tax paid under this chapter.
